description: Follows the process of pregnancy, explaining how a baby develops, what a mother experiences, and what prenatal care is necessary to ensure a healthy baby. Animation details the important stages of growth of the human embryo from conception through pregnancy. Stresses the complexity of the process and the role nutrition, exercise and good health habits play.
